response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously crafted and holds significant value, which I believe aligns well with your needs and aspirations. Considering its quality and uniqueness, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $950,000. This is an opportunity to secure a remarkable asset at a competitive rate. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can discuss the details further.", "product_price": 950000}
